quote: He wanted to tell her she'd have more room if she'd just get rid of her books, but he supposed that in her case, it would be like telling a mother she'd have more room if she threw out her children.
quote_letters: HE WANTED TO TELL HER SHED HAVE MORE ROOM IF SHED JUST GET RID OF HER BOOKS BUT HE SUPPOSED THAT IN HER CASE IT WOULD BE LIKE TELLING A MOTHER SHED HAVE MORE ROOM IF SHE THREW OUT HER CHILDREN
